reviews.text: Very good Japanese restaurant. Great food and loads of options, all very tasty.

This little place is hard to beat. The chirashi sushi lunch set was a generous portion, high in quality, including the rice, and very fair in price.  The side dishes were equally good.  The service was prompt and friendly. I will be back to try some of their other dishes.
Great quality of menu, excellent service. Highly Recommended.
Everything we had was really excellent;  these people really care about food and hospitality.
Small but very friendly with great food
Always very, very, very good. Exceptional service, exceptional food, fantastic setting. Need I say more? Have you reserved a table yet?
Great food. A little cramped inside but lovely outside on the street if weather permits.
Great italian place. Food is awesome and italian wines.
